name: Akroma, Angel of Wrath
oracle_text: Flying, first strike, vigilance, trample, haste, protection from black and from red
flavor_text: "No rest. No mercy. No matter what."

name: Akroma's Devoted
oracle_text: Cleric creatures have vigilance.
flavor_text: Akroma asked for only one thing from her troops: unwavering, unconditional loyalty.

name: Aven Redeemer
oracle_text: Flying
{T}: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
flavor_text: Redeemers rise with the sun, and the spirits of the people rise with them.

name: Aven Warhawk
oracle_text: Amplify 1 (As this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on it for each Bird and/or Soldier card you reveal in your hand.)
Flying

name: Beacon of Destiny
oracle_text: {T}: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, that damage is dealt to Beacon of Destiny instead.
flavor_text: "We all borrowed life from the Ancestor to exist in this world. Today, I repay that debt."

name: Celestial Gatekeeper
oracle_text: Flying
When Celestial Gatekeeper dies, exile it, then return up to two target Bird and/or Cleric permanent cards from your graveyard to the battlefield.

name: Cloudreach Cavalry
oracle_text: As long as you control a Bird, Cloudreach Cavalry gets +2/+2 and has flying.
flavor_text: "It's easy to lose sight of hope until you gaze out from my vantage point."

name: Daru Mender
oracle_text: Morph {W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Daru Mender is turned face up, regenerate target creature.

name: Daru Sanctifier
oracle_text: Morph {1}{W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Daru Sanctifier is turned face up, destroy target enchantment.

name: Daru Stinger
oracle_text: Amplify 1 (As this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on it for each Soldier card you reveal in your hand.)
{T}: Daru Stinger deals damage equal to the number of +1/+1 counters on it to target attacking or blocking creature.

name: Defender of the Order
oracle_text: Morph {W}{W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Defender of the Order is turned face up, creatures you control get +0/+2 until end of turn.

name: Deftblade Elite
oracle_text: Provoke (Whenever this creature attacks, you may have target creature defending player controls untap and block it if able.)
{1}{W}: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by Deftblade Elite this turn.

name: Essence Sliver
oracle_text: Whenever a Sliver deals damage, its controller gains that much life.
flavor_text: The slivers would survive, even at the expense of every other creature on Otaria.

name: Gempalm Avenger
oracle_text: Cycling {2}{W} ({2}{W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Gempalm Avenger, Soldier creatures get +1/+1 and gain first strike until end of turn.

name: Glowrider
oracle_text: Noncreature spells cost {1} more to cast.
flavor_text: "It is not yet time."

name: Liege of the Axe
oracle_text: Vigilance
Morph {1}{W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Liege of the Axe is turned face up, untap it.

name: Lowland Tracker
oracle_text: First strike
Provoke (Whenever this creature attacks, you may have target creature defending player controls untap and block it if able.)
flavor_text:
"I feed my hatred to the righteous and they join my crusade."
—Akroma, angelic avenger

name: Planar Guide
oracle_text: {3}{W}, Exile Planar Guide: Exile all creatures. At the beginning of the next end step, return those cards to the battlefield under their owners' control.
flavor_text: "Every moment has its own savior."

name: Plated Sliver
oracle_text: All Sliver creatures get +0/+1.
flavor_text: Overcoming extinction has only made the slivers more determined to live.

name: Starlight Invoker
oracle_text: {7}{W}: You gain 5 life.
flavor_text: The Mirari glows in her eyes.

name: Stoic Champion
oracle_text: Whenever a player cycles a card, Stoic Champion gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: His outer calm belies his inner fury.

name: Sunstrike Legionnaire
oracle_text: Sunstrike Legionnaire doesn't untap during your untap step.
Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, untap Sunstrike Legionnaire.
{T}: Tap target creature with converted mana cost 3 or less.

name: Swooping Talon
oracle_text: Flying
{1}: Swooping Talon loses flying until end of turn.
Provoke (Whenever this creature attacks, you may have target creature defending player controls untap and block it if able.)

name: Wall of Hope
oracle_text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Whenever Wall of Hope is dealt damage, you gain that much life.
flavor_text:
"What cage would you rather be inside of than out?"
—Daru riddle

name: Ward Sliver
oracle_text: As Ward Sliver enters the battlefield, choose a color.
All Slivers have protection from the chosen color.
flavor_text: The first wave of slivers perished from the Riptide wizards' magic. The second wave shrugged off their spells like water.

name: Whipgrass Entangler
oracle_text: {1}{W}: Until end of turn, target creature gains "This creature can't attack or block unless its controller pays {1} for each Cleric on the battlefield."
flavor_text: "Now that I have your attention, perhaps I can tell you of the Order."

name: White Knight
oracle_text: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
Protection from black (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything black.)
flavor_text: In the wretched depths of the Grand Coliseum, his soul shines like a single torch blazing in the night.

name: Windborn Muse
oracle_text: Flying
Creatures can't attack you unless their controller pays {2} for each creature they control that's attacking you.
flavor_text:
"Her voice is justice, clear and relentless."
—Akroma, angelic avenger

name: Wingbeat Warrior
oracle_text: Flying
Morph {2}{W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Wingbeat Warrior is turned face up, target creature gains first strike until end of turn.

name: Aven Envoy
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: Their grieving faces tell far more than a list of casualties ever could.

name: Cephalid Pathmage
oracle_text: Cephalid Pathmage can't be blocked.
{T}, Sacrifice Cephalid Pathmage: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.
flavor_text: Pathmages can open doors that aren't even there.

When Chromeshell Crab is turned face up, you may exchange control of target creature you control and target creature an opponent controls.

name: Covert Operative
oracle_text: Covert Operative can't be blocked.
flavor_text: Some spies seek clarity. Others seek transparency.

name: Crookclaw Elder
oracle_text: Flying

Tap two untapped Wizards you control: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.

Morph {2}{U}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Dermoplasm is turned face up, you may put a creature card with a morph ability from your hand onto the battlefield face up. If you do, return Dermoplasm to its owner's hand.

name: Dreamborn Muse
oracle_text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player puts the top X cards of their library into their graveyard, where X is the number of cards in their hand.

name: Echo Tracer
oracle_text: Morph {2}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Echo Tracer is turned face up, return target creature to its owner's hand.

name: Fugitive Wizard
flavor_text: Many wizards came to the Riptide Project hoping to return home with answers. Most, however, wouldn't return home at all.

name: Gempalm Sorcerer
oracle_text: Cycling {2}{U} ({2}{U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Gempalm Sorcerer, Wizard creatures gain flying until end of turn.

name: Glintwing Invoker
oracle_text: {7}{U}: Glintwing Invoker gets +3/+3 and gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: The Mirari flares in his mind.

name: Keeneye Aven
oracle_text: Flying
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor_text: "I have no need of a map. The very continent itself guides my way."

name: Keeper of the Nine Gales
oracle_text: Flying
{T}, Tap two untapped Birds you control: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: "You cannot fight the storm."

name: Master of the Veil

When Master of the Veil is turned face up, you may turn target creature with a morph ability face down.

name: Merchant of Secrets
oracle_text: When Merchant of Secrets enters the battlefield, draw a card.

oracle_text: Flying
{1}: Mistform Seaswift becomes the creature type of your choice until end of turn.
Morph {1}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

name: Mistform Sliver
oracle_text: All Slivers have "{1}: This permanent becomes the creature type of your choice in addition to its other types until end of turn."
flavor_text: Taking the form of a junior researcher, the first sliver slipped out of Riptide.

name: Mistform Ultimus
oracle_text: Mistform Ultimus is every creature type (even if this card isn't on the battlefield).
flavor_text: It may wear your face, but its mind is its own.

name: Mistform Wakecaster
oracle_text: Flying
{1}: Mistform Wakecaster becomes the creature type of your choice until end of turn.
{2}{U}{U}, {T}: Choose a creature type. Each creature you control becomes that type until end of turn.

oracle_text: Flying
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor_text: Though a completely artificial species, primocs are a natural fit for the skies of Otaria.

oracle_text: {2}{U}{U}, {T}: Draw a card for each Wizard you control.
flavor_text: Those who lead others to wisdom become the wisest themselves.

flavor_text: It wants you to be its chum.

name: Shifting Sliver
oracle_text: Slivers can't be blocked except by Slivers.

name: Synapse Sliver

name: Blade Sliver

name: Frenetic Raptor
oracle_text: Beasts can't block.
